title: Trigo (Aníbal Augusto)
body: The brother of the previous entry, born in Moncorvo on October 29, 1865, is also a civil engineer, having served in the Directorate of Public Works of the Funchal District, of which he is now the director, and in the technical department of the Municipal Council of this city. He collaborated on some of the works mentioned in the previous article, and as a municipal engineer, he always gave the most eloquent proofs of competence and great moral integrity (1921). He passed away on February 13, 1944.

Aníbal Augusto Trigo: Civil engineer, served in the Directorate of Public Works of the Funchal District, collaborated as a municipal engineer

1921: Aníbal Augusto Trigo collaborated on works mentioned in the previous article
